page.name: Class VLCVideoLayout
page.description: All Implemented Interfaces: android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback , android.view.KeyEvent.Callback , android.view.ViewManager , android.view.ViewParent , android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource public class VLCVideoLayout extends FrameLayout VLC-ready layout which includes 2 SurfaceView (video+subtitles) and 1 TextureView All these surfaces are stubs, only the relevant one(s) will be inflated Use it preferably with MediaPlayer .attachViews()
